predicate.note: Frames file for 'attract' based on annotation-on-the-fly of the financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Updated thanks to examples found by Kate.

role.descr: thing attracted to, if separate from attractor

example.name: with secondary attractor
example.text: A free market with a profit motive will attract each investor to the liquidity and risks he can tolerate.
example.arg: A free market with a profit motive
the liquidity and risks he can tolerate

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John attracts flies with his goaty boy smell.

example.name: attractor in obj position
example.text: British Air was originally attracted *trace* to the chance of obtaining a 15% stake in the company, but wasn't particularly happy with paying $750 million.
example.arg: the chance of obtaining a 15% stake in the company
